name: check-mlv2
title: Mobile Legends (v2)
description: Memeriksa nama/nickname pemain Mobile Legends berdasarkan User ID dan Zone ID menggunakan API Okeconnect.
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-mlv2 \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"12345678", "additional_id":"9123"}'
